headline: Alternative Investment Outperformance and Advisory Expansion Might Change the Case for Investing in Prudential (PRU)
summary: Earlier this month, Prudential Financial disclosed preliminary quarterly results, highlighting that its PGIM segment managed US$1.47 trillion in assets and outperformed near-term expectations for alternative investment income, while also expanding its key advisory offices in New York’s Rockefeller Center and Holmdel’s Bell Works campus. These developments underscore Prudential’s ongoing efforts to strengthen its financial advisor network and asset management business while highlighting the...
